comments:
M7

At some poit I suddendly couldn't set breakpoints anymore. The log shows:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.ToggleBreakpointAdapter$2.run(ToggleBreakpointAdapter.java:160)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:67)
*** Bug 95238 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Since we create breakpoints in background jobs now, it was possible to have a 
job run after the editor closes, in this case breakpoint creation is cancelled 
(the NPE indicated that an editor's document provider was null).

Job is now cancelled when document provider is null. Also changed error 
reporting (we were incorrectly trying to display an error message in a dialog 
rather than simply returning the status code to the job manager, which will 
report the error).

Changes to ToggleBreakpointAdapter. Also removed two unused messages from 
ActionMessages.java/.properties.
